story: As you move through the labyrinthine cyberpunk stronghold, a group of drones suddenly surrounds you. What do you do?

actions.action: Disable the drones with your hacking abilities
actions.good: Your expert hacking skills allow you to disarm the drones' programming, rendering them harmless. You slip by undetected and come away unscathed.
actions.bad: Your attempts to disable the drones trigger an alarm, drawing unwanted attention. The drones attack en masse, causing damage as they relentlessly pursuit you.

actions.action: Engage the drones in hand-to-hand combat
actions.good: With swift reflexes and precise strikes, you take down the drones one by one. Your fighting skills leave them impotent and unable to harm you.
actions.bad: You foolishly charge headfirst into a swarm of drones, taking significant damage as they bombard you with lasers and sparks. You narrowly escape before the drones can destroy you.

actions.action: Flee the scene, avoiding confrontation at all costs
actions.good: Your quick thinking and agility help you slip away unscathed, dodging the drones' advances. You successfully evade them undetected.
actions.bad: In your haste to escape, you accidentally trigger a concealed alarm, alerting the drones to your presence. They relentlessly pursue you as you take damage and struggle to find safety.
